name: Melon Hunter (exmxpx)
description:
Can you avoid the numerous traps and pitfalls to find all of the melons and eat happily ever after? Control the Melon Hunter with your keyboard or gamepad.  This is a free game, thank you for checking it out!

Game made using Unity.

Artwork: Pixel Adventure 1 (Unity Asset Store) by Pixel Frog

Sound Effects: Free Casual Game SFX Pack (Unity Asset Store) By Dustyroom

Music: exmxpx
